text: Jopep Borrell i Fontelles (born 24 April 1947 in La Pobla de Segur, Lleida) is a Spanish politician. He was President of the European Parliament from 20 July 2004 until 16 January 2007.Martin Banks (July 14, 2004), Parliamentâ€™s head boy European Voice. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official biography Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the European Parliament Category:Spanish politicians Category:High Representatives of the Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy
